docs.snippet: PHILADELPHIA, July 18--The York County Gas Company's proposal to sell $1,600,000 of first mortgage bonds at competitive bidding and $300,000 of serial promissory notes to a bank was approved today by the Securities and Exchange Commission.

docs.snippet: Business in the foreign exchange market last week revolved around establishing a rate for a currency which had just been altered (Sweden); an irregular trend in a now two-weeks' old modified unit ( Canada), and an impulsive rise in a currency of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Business in the foreign exchange market last week revolved around establishing a rate for a currency which had just been altered (Sweden); an irregular trend in a now two-weeks' old modified unit ( Canada), and an impulsive rise in a currency of fixed ratio but which "rumor" had it would be tailored because of "international developments" (British pound).

docs.snippet: LA PAZ, Bolivia, July 26 (U.P.)-- Former police chief, Maj. Jorge Eguino, was arrested near here today as he tried to flee disguised as an Indian. He will be brought to trial for the political assassinations of November, 1944, including those of...
docs.lead_paragraph: LA PAZ, Bolivia, July 26 (U.P.)-- Former police chief, Maj. Jorge Eguino, was arrested near here today as he tried to flee disguised as an Indian. He will be brought to trial for the political assassinations of November, 1944, including those of Opposition Senators Luis Calvo and Ruben Terrazas Sr.
docs.abstract: ex-Police Chief Maj Eguino seized while attempting escape; is charged with carrying out Villarroel orders in '44 assassination of 2 opposition Sens; other arrests noted; exiles arrive from Chile; Uruguay favors recognition

headline.main: EX-POLICE CHIEF SEIZED FLEEING FROM BOLIVIA
